website_summaries.verdict: If you already have a PayPal Business Account, this reader allows you to easily accept credit card payments with a single swipe.
pros: Works with iOS, Android, and Windows systems
Makes it easy to accept payments on the go
cons: Sometimes it takes multiple swipes to read a card
Must have a PayPal Business Account to use this reader

customer_reviews.title: NO LONGER SUPPORTED BY PAYPAL!
customer_reviews.text: PayPal no longer supports these devices. Would've been nice to know before I wasted my money. And I did research this and found these for sale ON the PayPal site. I have another device and wanted another as a backup. When I had numerous issues with the new device I called PayPal and they said they no longer support. Perhaps you should stop advertising them on your site then. TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: There is no guarantee you can use this product.
customer_reviews.text: Paypal swipe requires a particular paypal account. I was dienied for this simple upgrade for no reason. Reviewing online, lots of people are denied, including well established businesses. Customer service suggested Square.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Bear

customer_reviews.title: A little too complicated to use
customer_reviews.text: It's a little complicated to set up. You have to be approved for a PayPal business acct to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with my phone.
customer_reviews.text: This card reader would not insert well into my Samsung Galaxy 5's audio jack and would not make good connection. Occasionally the phone would recognize it was connected then instantly disconnect. Neither Amazon nor Paypal were very helpful with this problem. After a number of attempts to use it, I decided to send it back. At least Amazon made that part easy. Amazon was unable to give help with this device and connected me to Paypal. I concluded that either the device itself is defective or it simply would not perfectly fit in my phone's audio jack and seemed a bit loose. Just know that if you have an older phone it may not work.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Dockins

customer_reviews.title: This works well when you get it set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well when you get it set up and get approved to use it by PayPal, it's not actually plug and play at first. When you receive more than 500 a week you won't get your money for a month, which is part of the terms. If you don't already use PayPal and don't have a bank account linked, this is just not going to be worth it to you.
customer_reviews.author: anne sueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my freelance hair buisness a little bit easier... All my clients love the option of paying with a card instead of always having to carry cash. I also am able to get my money fast..which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: ... was very excited to get this because it sounds like a great idea for some reason it kept saying ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this because it sounds like a great idea for some reason it kept saying my account (which is a business account) wasn't right for it and because of that it simply doesn't work now I have a fancy piece of plastic I suggest square or etsy readers
customer_reviews.author: Esca

customer_reviews.title: The problem with the readers is that you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem with the readers is that you have to stick it really hard and your phone and sometimes it doesn't swipe no matter what you have to keep swiping to get the car to read sometimes you just have to key it in
customer_reviews.author: janette delli sante

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy yo use. Not suitable for the new smartphones, because there is no longer a 3.5mm slot. very clear and reliable credit clearing service but the fees are high compared to the competition
customer_reviews.author: Yitzhak B.

customer_reviews.title: Connected fine, transactions went through 1/3 of the time.
customer_reviews.text: I used it last night, and the transaction only went through 1/3 of the time. I'm not sure if it was my phone, which is likely since my phone hates me, but whatever the reason, I could only get it to go through every so often. My app said the reader was connected, so that wasn't the issue. I will be using it again soon, so if it works better I'll update
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Mixon

customer_reviews.title: Lost my original, nice to have less $ option to replace
customer_reviews.text: OEM PayPal reader. Works fine and much cheaper than the replacement from PayPal. (1st reader is free from PayPal so do not purchase if you have yet to get one)
customer_reviews.author: JeepGuyFL

customer_reviews.title: Get Paid
customer_reviews.text: Handy way to accept credit card payments. Ordered this a few days before my first art fair, and glad I did. Worked flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: P. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't work! They used to be awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These never work anymore. Used to be easy to use and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after 2 transactions.
customer_reviews.text: Would only ever work for the first two transactions, and then stop working. I thought this was an issue on my end, or I had a defected product. But this is the third one I’ve had, and they’ve all had the same. Save time, money, and headache and just get a square reader instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slider
customer_reviews.text: I love my PayPal reader. It definitely comes in handy and is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mann

customer_reviews.title: Request free reader through PayPal
customer_reviews.text: Card reader didn't work and I believe this purchase is the reason PayPal closed my account indefinitely. Very poor decision on my end to purchase this reader here instead of through PayPal
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could use it! PayPal for some reason will not let me use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just gotta keep it still while swiping Card, else it won't read.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just gotta keep it still while swiping Card, else it won't read.
customer_reviews.author: @EPICSOCALPICS

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Tried it the fist time only went threw my card only and no one elses card would go threw. Not something to get... not worth the money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNTIL YOU KNOW PAYPAL WILL ACTUALLY LET YOU **USE** IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used paypal for over 10 years and it never dawned on me, when I purchased their reader, that I would be declined and not allowed to use the reader for my business. What a waste of time. Thankfully, Amazon let me return it. But heads up - you have to go through a strange vetting process to be able to use it and odds are you will be declined, then stuck with their useless reader.
customer_reviews.author: Downeastcoast

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work! I have to get a new one and have been having to enter everything manually -_-
customer_reviews.author: LizzieIFBBPro

customer_reviews.title: I love this size bubble mailer
customer_reviews.text: I love this size bubble mailer! I sell jewelry and the ling necklaces fit perfectly! I also like that they slide in easily without sticking. Excellent product! I will be a repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Paypal user for 5 years and I started selling my art so I bought this. When I tried to set it up it said my account didn't qualify even though I am a business account and have a state sales tax #. Square > Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Because it isn't a chip reader, all funds received ...
customer_reviews.text: Because it isn't a chip reader, all funds received from credit cards with chips is held for an entire month. It's honestly making us rethink using PayPal for our small business.
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Research PayPal here before you purchase....not happy about them holding partial funds for 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make that money Honey
customer_reviews.text: Such super fast set up and app success. Wow. My friends and I have been joking about how many things we can get paid for now.
customer_reviews.author: South Seeds

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: please do not buy this product, i did not work with my device and i wam extremly dissapointed in the service
customer_reviews.author: Steigen

customer_reviews.title: But I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work for USAA chip cards yet. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Easley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but you can get one for free through pay pal. However, I like having two.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Works with PayPal Here
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. You have to really click it in the port firmly. Sometimes you have to swipe a couple of times, but the app tells you that. The first use every time, it seems I have to pull it out and re-plug it, but that may be user technique. Yes, it worked without wifi out in a park for a festive. Yay! You need this if you do craft fairs or fall festivals, etc., because pretty much nobody carries cash... LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Plum2

customer_reviews.title: get a square
customer_reviews.text: Item damaged and defective sent with a sticker that says damaged and defective. Purchased a new one because I'm still waiting on the free one for signing up. I hate companies that give the run around. Now I have to waste my time and resources by printing out a return label, buying a bubble mailer, and bringing it to ups while this could have been avoided from PayPal sending my initial reader or quality assurance ensuring that damaged and defective items are placed separately from sellable goods. I'd give no stars if I could. Update: Contacted PayPal, sent me two card readers free of charge. Both working properly.
customer_reviews.author: JPATIN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it if you need to use it right away - takes forever to approve your account
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a event where i had to take payments and PayPal took 3 days to approve account so I didn’t even need it by then anymore . I had to go to Best Buy and buy a square reader that was really annoying and I have had PayPal for years so I don’t know why it took so long
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, was reported stolen before purchase so freezes PayPal acct
customer_reviews.text: Product will not work. My husbands paypal acct got all messed up when he used this reader. After multiple phone calls with PayPal reps they said the problem with the reader is it was reported stolen before we even bought it so it will always freeze his acct if he tries to use it. No response from the seller's when i emailed them.
customer_reviews.author: Woopty doo

customer_reviews.title: Say no to PayPal.
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to the seller if they are not PayPal but a second party. I will not be using paypal it their product again. They are holding over $200 of my money and have been for a month. I have been a verified seller for years. They are doing this to force their chip readers into people. Switching to square for any of my future sales.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: get it
customer_reviews.text: great and easy to use. better then other brand I had before. payments went in fast. I was only vendor taking cards and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: JOE ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with the Google Pixel 3
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with the Google Pixel 3 even with the proper adapter.
customer_reviews.author: V.B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad-Product even worse customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Unfortunately, I now have two of the swipers. I tried to return one and had ZERO response from customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have It!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement lost another one while on the go can't do my job without it!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas & Victoria strock

customer_reviews.title: PayPal will GIVES you one if you have point of sale version
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can just plug it in and go . It reads a card, haven’t had any problems. I don’t use it much, as PayPal will send you one of these or a better Bluetooth chip reader version for FREE. Team free card reader
customer_reviews.author: eryn

customer_reviews.title: Good for sales
customer_reviews.text: As described worked flawlessly the times I have used it to complete transactions.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! like the black better than my old blue one
customer_reviews.author: M Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sturdy Material
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Apollo

customer_reviews.title: But I love the ease of use when at crafts fairs and ...
customer_reviews.text: You can get these free at Paypal. But I love the ease of use when at crafts fairs and such.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda A. Welbourn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly! It's so small and easy to use. The PayPal here app is very user friendly also. Great way to increase your payment options.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiandlilismom

customer_reviews.title: WTF PAYPAL?!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to use paypal for my new business, as it would have been so easy. However, to use this reader you have to get "approved" to use the "new" paypal program, and for some reason they won't allow me to. So this reader is absolutely useless. I am pretty upset. On the bright side, I had to use square instead, and I love it. Paypal, you lost my business.
customer_reviews.author: Amahel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As is described. However you get this free when you sign up :(
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: S'awrite.
customer_reviews.text: Keep cycling through these readers...They have about a four-month life before they stop reading cards. (I swipe about four times a day.) But while it works, what a great invention!
customer_reviews.author: LEditrix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works for swipes but lacks chip reader that the square version has.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even work, PayPal said they would allow its use with my account. Not sure why. I have a buisnesss account setup with then. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I cannot get this to read any cards through Etsy ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this to read any cards through Etsy. As a seller, I frequently attend trade shows & wanted an easier way of accepting credit transactions. I followed the instructions step by step & according to the PayPal app, the "test" went through successfully, but for some reason, when I actually go to use it it will not read. Have tried with at least 6+ different cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Problem with installation. Used Pay Pal for years but not able to set up an n\o help from Pay Pal. Bought Square D. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works, you do have to down load the app for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work in both my Nexus and Galaxy tab.
customer_reviews.author: The Woj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting a business and from the reviews I've read, this should work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: PayPal Mobile Card Reader
product_meta.description: PayPal Here Mobile Card Reader this product has the following all along with it as such as paypal here mobile card reader.
feature_bullets: Available on iOS, Android and Windows
Just 2.7 percent per U.S. Card swipe*
No long-term commitment – No monthly fees, cancelation fees, or processing minimums
Track cash payments and send invoices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars180 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
